channel.title: Deep on My Braindump
channel.description: Recent content in Deep on My Braindump

item.title: Tensorflow Cheatsheet
item.description: Suppress Tensorflow Warnings import os os.environ["TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL"] = "2" Allow for GPU Memory Growth import tensorflow as tf physical_devices = tf.config.list_physical_devices("GPU") tf.config.experimental.set_memory_growth(physical_devices[0], True)
